column1: We perform Ribosome Profiling (Ribo-seq) analysis of mouse brain neocortex during development embyonic days 12.5, 14, 15.5, 17, and postnatal day 0 in biological duplicate Overall design: Each biological replicate analyzed for ribosome-protected mRNA fragments after RNAse digestion (Ribosome Profiling, Ribo-seq)
